Position: Specialist – Government Affairs
Advocacy work in circularity and plastics recycling technologies, business support, monitoring German legislation, coordination with European Government Affairs Team.

Experienced in Government affairs and advocacy in the field of circular economy and
recycling for an American chemical company in the political arena in Berlin; driving pro-active advocacy to federal and state governments as well as through trade associations.
For further information please contact Julie Smith on 01695 570 696 or email Julie.smith@johnston-vere.co.uk
